metadata.name: The Constitutional Convention #1
metadata.description:
The Constitutional Convention is a project by Rampp.xyz - we made this project without code!

While the efforts behind the $PEOPLE token were noble, we did not succeed. Now you could have redeemed those tokens if you had enough to cover gas, but many didnt. Showcase an NFT of your efforts supporting ConstitutionDAO with an on-chain NFT.

Shirts become redeemable on mint out.
